mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT i.indica_no, TO_CHAR(i.indica_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') indica_dt, i.indica_nm FROM indica i JOIN indica_d id ON i.indica_no = id.indica_no LEFT JOIN prcs_pr_m p ON (id.prdt_cd = p.prdt_cd AND id.indica_deta_no = p.indica_deta_no) WHERE p.wk_dt is null ORDER BY indica_no
SELECT rsc_cd, prdt_cd, rsc_nm, rsc_use_qty, prcs_nm FROM prdt_bom WHERE prdt_cd = #{prdtCd}

SELECT r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_lot, (select rsc_use_qty from prdt_bom where prdt_cd = #{prdtCd} and rsc_cd = #{rscCd}) as rsc_use_qty, (nvl((select sum(rsc_qty) from rsc_inout where r.rsc_fg=1 and rsc_lot=r.rsc_lot),0) -nvl((select sum(rsc_qty) from rsc_inout where r.rsc_fg=0 and rsc_lot=r.rsc_lot),0) ) as rsc_stc FROM rsc_inout r WHERE rsc_cd = #{rscCd}

SELECT B.plan_deta_no, A.plan_no, TO_CHAR(B.plan_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD') plan_dt, (SELECT co_nm FROM co WHERE co_cd = O.co_cd) co_nm, O.co_cd, TO_CHAR((SELECT recv_dt FROM order_tb WHERE order_no = b.order_no), 'YYYY/MM/DD') recv_dt, B.prdt_cd, (SELECT prdt_nm FROM prdt WHERE prdt_cd = B.prdt_cd) prdt_nm, B.order_no, TO_CHAR(O.paprd_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD') paprd_dt, (SELECT order_qty FROM order_d WHERE order_no = B.order_no AND prdt_cd =B.prdt_cd) order_qty, B.plan_qty, TO_CHAR(B.wk_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD') wk_dt, B.wk_ord, A.plan_dt, A.plan_nm, (SELECT min(uph) FROM EQM) as day_output, (B.plan_qty/(SELECT min(uph) FROM EQM)) as prod_day FROM plan A, plan_d B, order_tb O WHERE A.plan_no = B.plan_no AND B.order_no = O.order_no AND (SELECT order_qty FROM order_d WHERE order_no = b.order_no AND prdt_cd = b.prdt_cd) > (SELECT indica_qty FROM order_d WHERE order_no = b.order_no AND prdt_cd = b.prdt_cd) ORDER BY prdt_cd, paprd_dt, order_qty desc
SELECT nvl(count(prdt_lot), 0)+1 FROM prdt_stc WHERE prdt_dt = sysdate
SELECT cmmn_cd_deta_id FROM cmmn_data_d WHERE cmmn_cd_id = 'rsc'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO indica (indica_no, indica_dt, indica_nm) VALUES( CREATENO('IND', INDICASEQ.nextval), TO_DATE(#{indicaDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{indicaNm} )

SELECT nvl(max(indica_deta_no), 0)+1 FROM indica_d
INSERT INTO indica_d (indica_deta_no, indica_no, indica_dt, plan_deta_no, prdt_cd, prod_fg, indica_qty, wk_ord, wk_dt, plan_dt) VALUES( #{indicaDetaNo}, (SELECT nvl(max(indica_no),0) FROM indica), TO_DATE(#{indicaDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{planDetaNo}, #{prdtCd}, #{prodFg}, #{indicaQty}, #{wkOrd}, TO_DATE(#{wkDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_DATE(#{planDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') )

SELECT nvl(max(rsc_con_no), 0)+1 FROM rsc_con
INSERT INTO rsc_con ( rsc_con_no, indica_deta_no, rsc_lot, rsc_con_qty ) VALUES ( #{rscConNo}, #{indicaDetaNo}, #{rscLot}, #{rscQty} )
INSERT INTO rsc_inout ( rsc_slip_no, rsc_cd, rsc_lot, rsc_qty, rsc_fg ) VALUES ( 'rout'|| to_char(sysdate,'yyMMdd') || trim(to_char(RSCJEONPYOSEQ.nextval, '000')), #{rscCd}, #{rscLot}, #{rscQty}, 0 )
INSERT INTO prdt_rsc ( prdt_lot, rsc_lot, rsc_con_qty) VALUES ( #{prdtLot}, #{rscLot}, #{rscUseQty} )

SELECT nvl(max(prdt_inx), 0)+1 FROM prdt_stc
INSERT INTO prdt_stc ( prdt_inx, prdt_lot, prdt_fg, prdt_cd, indica_deta_no ) VALUES ( #{prdtInx}, #{prdtLot}, 'P', #{prdtCd}, #{indicaDetaNo} )
